name: zero_sum
description:
Playing the Windows version is highly recommended! The browser version tends to lag after playing for some time.

DOWNLOAD IT HERE! (Windows)

--Controls--

A - Move Left

D - Move Right

W or Space - Jump

Q - Toggles placement mode

Placement Mode 1:

Press Left Mouse Button - Prepare block to be placed

Release Left Mouse Button - Place block

Placement Mode 2:

Press Left Mouse Button - Place block

-------------------

My jam entry for Ludum Dare 30!

Brent Popp - Programming, Sound, and Gameplay Design

Andreas Illenseer - Art and Gameplay Design

-------------------

Thank you for playing!
